title: ArtyTorrent Pack 80-Spectrasonics Atmosphere VSTi Disc 4
description:
ArtyTorrent Pack 80-Spectrasonics Atmosphere VSTi Disc 4
--------------------------------------------------------

This is disc 4 of 6, presented as an ISO file to be mounted on a virtual drive with PowerISO, or to be burned on a CD-ROM.

Atmosphere is a "Dream Synth" ROMpler instrument with a superb soundbank of 3.4GB of synth leads, pads and basses. It&#039;s one of my favourite synth plug-ins because it has so many excellent sounds and the clear GUI makes it very easy to use.

The retail version is provided on 6 CD-ROMs. I&#039;m posting each one separately over the course of a few days.

A keygen was included with Disc 1. An update to Atmosphere version 2.1 will be included with Disc 6.

The program cannot be installed without all 6 discs, so make sure you have them all.
Please be patient for the initial upload, and seed for as long as possible for the benefit of all.

If you like it, buy it!
--
Arty - "What&#039;s blue and sounds great?"
22nd February 2008
